note: Immigration lawyer & 1st with website, blog & AI apps. Author of 8 books on immigration. ABA Law Practice Magazine columnist. Disclaimers -http://bit.ly/3EEsGGI Co-Founder of IMMPact Litigation (www.immpactlitigation.com), Siskind Susser immigration lawyers (www.visalaw.com) and software company Visalaw.ai.  And since I get more bio space than that other site, I’m in Memphis and will also post about politics in general, Tennessee teams and triathlon sports (especially biking).

I teach journalism at NYU, critique the press, try to suggest reforms. PressThink is the name of my subject and my site. "Chill before serving" is my social media motto. Elvis Costello's version of "What's so funny 'bout peace, love, and understanding" is my theme song.
